##  Data

`r params$state.name` has extensive historical state summative assessment data from
the [`r params$test.name[1]` (`r params$test.abv[1]`)](`r noquote(params$test.url[1])`)
`r if(length(params$test.name) > 1) paste0("and [", params$test.name[2], " (", params$test.abv[2], ")](", params$test.url[2], ")")`
in `r params$GL_text_long` for grades `r min(as.numeric(params$grades))-1` to
`r max(as.numeric(params$grades))` `r if(!is.null(params$test.trans.year)) paste0("(transitioning from ", params$test.trans.name, " assessments in 2019)")`
to evaluate student achievement and growth over the two-year gap in assessment
data. `r ifelse(!is.null(params$additional.data.description), params$additional.data.description, "")`

We calculated baseline growth for 2021 (using 2019 as the baseline year with
`r paste(unique(c(SGP:::yearIncrement("2019", 1, 3), "2017")), collapse=" to ")`
`r if(!is.null(params$test.trans.year)) paste(params$test.trans.name, "assessments")`
as priors).
